item.title: Database backups, dump files and restic
item.description:
Here's some notes about that. new /srv/backup/mariadb/all. gz and then at some point that day the backup system picks that file up.

item.title: Rockylinux.org not hosted on Rocky Linux
item.description:
Rocky Linux is led by Gregory Kurtzer, founder of the CentOS project. The CentOS project recently announced a shift in strategy for CentOS. Rocky Linux aims to function as a downstream build as CentOS had done previously, building releases after they have been added by the upstream vendor, not before.

Read more
